data.title: District and borough councils
data.text:
We work closely with Derby City Council, the 8 district and borough councils in Derbyshire and the Peak District National Park Authority.

Share this page

Share via LinkedIn

Share via Email

Depending on where you live, the service you require may be administered by one of the following councils.

Amber Valley Borough Council tel: 01773 570222

Bolsover District Council tel: 01246 242424

Chesterfield Borough Council tel: 01246 345345

Derbyshire Dales District Council tel: 01629 761100

Erewash Borough Council tel: 0115 907 2244

High Peak Borough Council tel: 0345 129 7777

North East Derbyshire District Council tel: 01246 231111

South Derbyshire District Council tel: 01283 595795

Derby City Council tel: 01332 640000

Peak District National Park Authority tel: 01629 816200
